listings.title: table
listings.description: it stands and it is made out of mahogony wood. Comes with several legs.

listings.title: yo-yo
listings.description: it can walk the dog, it is red, and you can use it as a weapon in the state of Florida. Totally legal. Make my day.

listings.title: taco
listings.description: got one too many tacos from taco bell. Can't find a homeless person to give it to. Pick it up at your convenience. First come first serve.

listings.title: cuisinart
listings.description: if you like smoothies, you can use this blender. It's just like a jamba juice blender except not as good.

listings.title: the herb
listings.description: decided to start selling my ganja since now it is legal. No stems, no seeds. Smoke weed erryday.
